title: Can Eitekaf be done at home or in a Mussallah or Prayer Hall? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: it says we don't have erticaf due to the closure of masjids can we do it home the answer is no erticaf can only be performed in a full-fledged masjid it cannot be performed in a prayer hall or a muslim or survi i think you go you guys i don't know i've lost the language so this is not permissible except in a full-fledged masjid if it's closed then allah will give you intention reward according to your intention insha'allah you
